messages.subject: Muramasa
messages.msgSnippet: Hey everybody: Just needed a little refresher. I lost some info. on Sengo Muramaa the swordsmith, when was he alive? From when to when? Thanks, Rod
messages.messageBody:
Hey everybody:

Just needed a little refresher. I lost some info. on Sengo Muramaa the
swordsmith, when was he alive? From when to when?

Thanks,
Rod
